name: Joy
0:
”Alexa, open Joy chatbot.”
”Alexa, start Joy chatbot.”
”Alexa, begin Joy chatbot.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: joy chatbot
des: Joy is Singapore’s very first Corporate Banking Virtual Assistant, created to assist small-to-medium enterprises (SMEs) on their corporate banking inquiries. Using artificial intelligence, Joy can address various queries – from matters pertaining to business account balances, transaction statuses and even updating of company addresses. Made ready and available 24/7, all banking-related queries can be answered anytime and anywhere by Joy through BizChat by DBS BusinessCare.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
